name: Martini
about: The Martini is arguably the most iconic cocktail in the world. It evolved from the Martinez cocktail in the late 19th century and has been a symbol of sophistication ever since.
instructions: Chill a martini glass in the freezer or fill with ice and water
Add gin and dry vermouth to a mixing glass with ice
Stir for about 30 seconds until well-chilled
Empty the martini glass and strain the cocktail into it
Express lemon peel over the drink or garnish with olives
notes: The ratio of gin to vermouth is highly personal. This is a classic 5:1 ratio, but some prefer it drier (more gin), while others prefer more vermouth. The 'perfect' Martini uses equal parts dry and sweet vermouth.
